extendedInfo.description: College is about to get more interesting. Get ready for the biggest online party you've seen since moving out of your parents' basement. Fill up the dorms with new roommates while completing jobs and joining clubs to make your reputation soar. Every dance off and prank gets you one step closer to becoming the most popular student on campus! Orientation is one tap away... GAMER REVIEWS: "This game is so so fun and wild!" -Bella"I can't believe how FREAKING AMAZING this game is!" -peterz"LOVE TO PARTY." -coralisaFEATURES: â Rent out dorm rooms and add to your crew.â Challenge other students to dance-offs.â Prank, fight and eavesdrop on other students!â Choose from a variety of characters like Bro, Club Girl and Hipster.â Join forces with others to form clubs and participate in club wars and parties!â Real time in-game news feed, campus chat, tutors chat and forum.â Send hilarious gifts to other players.PLEASE NOTE: This is an ONLINE game only! Tablet users must be connected to WiFi in order to play.
